title: Typophile Forum header face
content: Is that Farnham at the top of every forum page?
author: adnix

comments.content: Funny you should guess Farnham. Our very own Yves is working on a review for typographer.org which includes a bunch of faces influenced by Fleishmann and Rosart. DTL Fleishmann, Farnham, Mercury, Fenway…
It is indeed Mercury. The one atop the forum posts is Gotham. Both courtesy of [Hoefler & Frere-Jones](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Hoefler%20&%20Frere-Jones).
